bibl.title: Cleopatra's Egypt. Age of the Ptolemies.
bibl.author: Bianchi Bagnall Goyon Quaegebeur
bibl.note: Catalog of an exhibition held at the Brooklyn Museum Oct. 7, 1988 - Jan. 2, 1989, the Detroit Institute of Arts, Feb. 14 - April 30, 1989, and Kunsthalle der Hypo-Kulturstiftung in Munich, June 8 - Sept. 10, 1989. - The Catalog includes Essays by R.S. Bianchi, R.S. Bagnall, J.-Cl. Goyon and J. Quaegebeur.
bibl.seg: Cleopatra's Egypt. Age of the Ptolemies.
Brooklyn Museum, 1988, 4Â°, [ii]-293 pp., 212 figg. et pll. n./bl., et 36 pll. coul.

Catalog of an exhibition held at the Brooklyn Museum Oct. 7, 1988 - Jan. 2, 1989, the Detroit Institute of Arts, Feb. 14 - April 30, 1989, and Kunsthalle der Hypo-Kulturstiftung in Munich, June 8 - Sept. 10, 1989. - The Catalog includes Essays by R.S. Bianchi, R.S. Bagnall, J.-Cl. Goyon and J. Quaegebeur.
C.R. par Jutta Fischer, Gnomon 66 (1994) pp. 165-171. - Herwig Maehler, BibO 49 (1992) coll. 422-428. - Dorothy J. Thompson, ChrEg 65 (1990) No. 129, pp. 182-184.
